name: Glencore Agriculture
goal: Glencore Agriculture is a market leader in originating, handling, processing and marketing agricultural commodities, including grain, oilseeds, pulses, sugar, rice, cotton, vegetable oils, protein meals and biodiesel.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
